title: Research Software & Infrastructure Support
text:
If your main focus is research, technical difficulties can sometimes be a nuisance. I can help get you started, or answer more specific questions about a technology or a piece of code.
A typical request can look like this:

For my project I am interested in posts from this website, how can I get those?
I have a large amount of data; how can I structure it and make it accessible to my colleagues?
I am using this software in my study but shouldn’t run it on my laptop, what are the alternatives?

title: SURF Research Cloud
SURF Research Cloud
Data donation
text:
It’s a study paradigm to process digital trace data contained in so called data download packages. Users of a platform obtain these packages as part of the study via the platform itself and can “donate” them via a software.
You can read about the software in detail here and about the paradigm itself here.

title: Data donation
text:
How much does it cost?
The software can run on the SURF Research Cloud. You can use the calculator to estimate the costs - usually, it’s not much. For the right estimate, use 2 CPU cores and the time you expect your study to run, usually around 2-3 months.

title: Data donation
text:
How can I help?
Preparing a data donation study has two technical components:

Creating data processing scripts
Running the software on cloud infrastructure

If you need help with any of these or want to know more about data donation in general, reach out.
